title: Master Mechanic-Technician NEW!
full_description: We are looking for a Master Mechanic-Technician to join our team! You will be responsible for repairing various vehicles and transmission systems. Responsibilities:Repair automobiles, trucks, buses, and other motor vehiclesSpecialize in vehicle transmission systemsPerform routine vehicle maintenanceUse diagnostic tools to test vehicle componentsPerform quality inspections prior to returning the vehicle to the customerQualifications:Previous experience as a mechanicKnowledge of shop equipmentStrong mechanical aptitude and troubleshooting skillsDeadline and detail-orientedAbility to thrive in a fast-paced environment
